title: DOCUMENTATION: How to Use the applyUrl Field
description:
### How to Configure Application Links

The `applyUrl` field is flexible and can handle three types of links:

**1. Standard Web Link:**
For application portals or external job sites. Just use the full URL.
*Example:* `"https://example.com/job/apply/123"`

**2. Email Application (mailto):**
To open the user's email client with a pre-filled message. Use the `mailto:` format. You can add a subject and body to the email.
*Example:* `"mailto:hr@example.com?subject=Application%20for%20Optometrist%20Position&body=Please%20find%20my%20resume%20attached."`
*Note:* Use `%20` for spaces and `%0A` for new lines in the body.

**3. WhatsApp Message (wa.me):**
To open a WhatsApp chat with a pre-filled message. Use the `https://wa.me/` link followed by the phone number (with country code) and the message text.
*Example:* `"https://wa.me/919876543210?text=I'm%20interested%20in%20the%20Optometrist%20position."`
*Note:* Use `%20` for spaces in the message.

title: Senior Clinical Optometrist
description:
### Job Description
Join our flagship clinic in central London. We are seeking an experienced optometrist to lead our clinical team, specializing in ocular disease management and advanced contact lens fitting. Mentorship opportunities available.

title: Pediatric Optometrist
description:
### Job Description
We are looking for a passionate pediatric optometrist to join our vibrant team. The ideal candidate has experience with children of all ages and a strong background in binocular vision and myopia control. Flexible part-time hours.

title: Optical Assistant
description:
### Job Description
Seeking a customer-focused Optical Assistant to help with frame selection, dispensing, and pre-testing. Training will be provided, but prior retail or optical experience is a plus. Great opportunity for growth. Apply via WhatsApp.

title: Ophthalmic Technician
description:
### Job Description
Our state-of-the-art hospital requires a skilled Ophthalmic Technician to perform diagnostic testing, including OCT, visual fields, and topography. Experience with pre- and post-operative surgical care is essential.

title: Research Optometrist
description:
### Job Description
Join a 12-month research project focused on novel treatments for dry eye disease. This role involves patient recruitment, conducting clinical trials, and data analysis. A Master's degree or prior research experience is required.

title: Dispensing Optician - Luxury Retail
description:
### Job Description
We seek an experienced Dispensing Optician for our flagship luxury boutique. The role requires exceptional customer service skills and expertise in high-end, bespoke eyewear. Fluency in French and English is required.

title: Tele-Optometrist (Remote)
description:
### Job Description
Provide remote eye health consultations and prescription renewals via our secure telemedicine platform. Must be a licensed optometrist in any Canadian province. Flexible hours, work from home.

title: Optometry Clinic Manager
description:
### Job Description
We are looking for an experienced manager to oversee daily operations, staff management, and business development for our busy suburban practice. An optometry background is preferred but not required.

title: Contact Lens Specialist
description:
### Job Description
Join our team of contact lens experts. This role focuses on fitting specialty lenses, including scleral, RGP, and orthokeratology lenses. You will work with complex cases and collaborate with referring ophthalmologists.
